Articles.Content:
Does any one here like and/or have heard of and/or have played any Touhou games?

If you do, say whatever.

Just wondering.
I have all non-special/non-fighting Windows games up to Subterranean Animism.
Not yet, but Sakuya is already my favourite character

I've heard of it, but only because a guy I subscribed to on YouTube makes music based on it:

Oh, and Bad Apple. I've heard of it because of that, too.
I have played just about all of them, but I like their fighting games the most.
I have a friend who got me into it six months ago. I suck at the games though.

I've played a few. Never beaten any of 'em, though.

They've got good music, too.

*Necrobump*

I got into it like 2 months ago, started from the beginning and now I'm at Mystic Square. Don't really want to know how much homework I ignored due to Touhou...

I wonder why there are no KSP mods about Touhou Project. Maybe I will make it. 

In China, there are a lot of KSP players like me who like Touhou Project (^^;
